title: Help with Email Change
body: Hi, I tried to change my email because my email that is linked to my league got hacked and they changed the password, but I'd need to get into the hacked email to change the account linked to my league? Is there any other way I can switch my league email??

replies.body: We'd like to help with your individual issue through a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our account team can help you regain access to your account and get your email fixed up.  You can also review our [account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account)guy to prepare for verification questions that may be asked.  We'll respond to the ticket asap!
